body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hilltop Web Design Agency. My name is Samuel Hill. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Samuel, my name is Madison Powell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, Madison. How can I assist you today? Can you provide me with your email address and phone number for further assistance?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is mpowell@example.com and my phone number is five five five two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. How can I assist you further? Do you have any specific questions about our services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have two questions. Firstly, how long does it usually take to complete a website design project? Secondly, do you offer ongoing maintenance services for websites after they are launched?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Typically, our website design projects take around six to eight weeks to complete, depending on the complexity. Yes, we do provide ongoing maintenance services to ensure your website runs smoothly post-launch.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison, for your time and questions. Please feel free to reach out if you have any further inquiries. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Samuel. I appreciate your help. Goodbye.
